messages.content: never felt like anything except spike were worth it
<spike encode colorless> <dazing pulse> <explode colorless>

embeds.title: Spike
embeds.description:
Special Attack / 0 :e_colorless: / Colorless

Deal 4 (6) damage.
**Encode.**
**Compile** - Gain 4 (6) Thorns:p_thorns:.

embeds.title: Dazing Pulse
embeds.description:
Special Attack / 1 :e_colorless: / Colorless

Gain 7 (9) **Block:p_block:**
Deal 7 (9) damage.
**Encode.**
**Compile** Error - **Insert** 2 Dazed.

embeds.title: Explode
embeds.description:
Special Skill / 1 :e_colorless: / Colorless

Apply 15 (20) **Soulburn:p_soulburn:** to ALL enemies.
**Encode.**
**Compile** Error - **Insert** 2 Burn.

messages.content: inserting statuses always seems like such a big downside
chosen is already hard, why would i take cards that do what chosen does? ~~unless it's oil spill~~
it's also why im unsure people think buggy mess is so good 🤔
how are you spending all that energy when auto has no draw and you're flooding the deck with statuses
anyways spike is nice. passive thorns are good and can be increased by fine tuning
probably relying on the cycle statuses card
possible
that thing is so broken ngl
yeah. drawing a ton AND multi-hitting
a bit overloaded
but yeah I’d mostly just take spike unless already having foundations of a status deck
usually i take just dazing pulse
encodable iron wave+ that lets you more easily lean into auto's status side? yes please
and from the easiest enemy to fight of the three
spike is nice but not as nice as dazing pulse and i can almost never deal with a spiker in act 1 so i usually think its not worth it
yeah that's what I do
also a deck that can deal with a spiker in act 1 would probably get its ass thoroughly beat by Nob
unless it was using poison
or other non-attack damage
and auto doesn't have much of that
the only poison is also attack damage lol
the other non-attack damage is <Summon Orb>

embeds.title: Summon Orb
embeds.description:
Rare Power / 2 :e_automaton: / The Automaton

Whenever you create or play a Function, gain 4 (6) **Block:p_block:** and deal 4 (6) damage to a random enemy.

messages.content: which is rare
and it's a bit hard to make functions without any attacks
Yeah I take anything but explode. Even without the 2 burns I'd think it's just alright.

very cool event in the way that its implemented. Two of the cards you get are pretty great, dazing pulse is super good giving great value for one cost and creating a strong function with a fairly manageable downside. Spike is busted, 4 thorns for zero is plenty strong, but you can even get some more thorns by using fine tuning. Lastly there is explode, which I have not built a deck around yet as this event is rare; the raw numbers are strong but its autos only soulburn card so good luck making a deck around it unless you see this event super early
I like how automation gets to cheat and have even more cards in its pool with this event and the donu/deca one
also Spike being busted is balanced out by Spiker being the hardest to fight in act 1
which is funny because I think in act 3 spiker is by far the easiest
I mean <cleanse> massively reduces the risk for that card

embeds.title: Cleanse
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 1 :e_automaton: / The Automaton

Deal 9 (12) damage.
**Exhaust** a random **Status** card in your draw pile.

messages.content: But at that point your just turning buggy mess into 9 dmg
Auto has <Bug Barrage> and can shrink their deck down massively

embeds.title: Bug Barrage
embeds.description:
Common Attack / 1 :e_automaton: / The Automaton

Gain 1 (2) Wound (Wounds).
**Cycle** each **Status**, dealing 7 damage for each.

messages.content: I suppose <explode> can be a deck by itself with <for loop>

embeds.title: Explode
embeds.description:
Special Skill / 1 :e_colorless: / Colorless

Apply 15 (20) **Soulburn:p_soulburn:** to ALL enemies.
**Encode.**
**Compile** Error - **Insert** 2 Burn.

embeds.title: For Loop
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / X :e_automaton: / The Automaton

The next card you **Encode** causes X (+1) additional copies to also be **Encoded.**
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: That's literally just <the bomb>

embeds.title: The Bomb
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 2 :e_colorless: / Colorless

At the end of 3 turns, deal 40 (50) damage to ALL enemies.

messages.content: buggy mess could make voids and it would still be great
it makes your function effectively free, alone thats strong but its so easy to bump up the energy gain (fine tuning, sentient form etc) and go crazy

with the encode errors in general, automation can make them outright postive for you with cards like its a feature. But normally they just are not to big of a downside to pay and theres even error prevention in the card pool.
Buggy mess shuffling a void/dazed isn't an error effect though
true, but its effectively the same thing; putting status in your deck from the functions which just isnt a very big deal compared to other characters
And it happens twice for each one you have
One when you use it and one when you use the function
Pinned a message.
